Decay.effect: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.

Doubt.effect: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, gain 1 Weak.

Normality.effect: Unplayable. While in hand, you cannot play more than 3 cards this turn.

Pain.effect: Unplayable. While in hand, lose 1 HP whenever you play another card.

Parasite.effect: Unplayable. If transformed or removed from your deck, lose 3 Max HP.

Regret.effect: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, lose HP equal to the number of cards in your hand.

Shame.effect: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, gain 1 Frail.

Ascender's Bane.effect: Unplayable. Ethereal. Cannot be removed from your deck.

Curse of the Bell.effect: Unplayable. Cannot be removed from your deck.

Necronomicurse.effect: Unplayable. There is no escape from this Curse.

Pride.effect: Innate. At the end of your turn, put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
